entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 05:58 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: N 39 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
